findings.quote: 6.3% peak during the pandemic in April 2020
findings.issue: Grossly incorrect - actual April 2020 rate was 14.7%. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2020/unemployment-rate-rises-to-record-high-14-point-7-percent-in-april-2020.htm

findings.quote: The US unemployment rate reached 3.5% in December 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect data - actual rate was 4.1% in December 2024. Source: cnbc.com/2025/01/10/jobs-report-december-2024.html

findings.quote: The US unemployment rate reached 3.5% in December 2024
findings.issue: Future date reference - document cannot contain December 2024 data if written before that date
Vague citation lacking specific source - should cite Bureau of Labor Statistics
December 2024 is in the future relative to the document's apparent creation date

findings.quote: as measured by the Consumer Price Index, was 3.1% year-over-year in November 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect data - actual November 2024 CPI was 2.7%. Source: cnbc.com/2024/12/11/cpi-inflation-november-2024

findings.quote: A recent Stanford study found that remote work increases productivity by 13%
findings.issue: Misattributed - 13% figure is from older Chinese study, not recent work. Source: nber.org/system/files/working_papers/w18871/w18871.pdf

findings.quote: published in the American Economic Review in 2023
findings.issue: Cannot verify publication - no 2023 AER article found with these details

findings.quote: Congressional Budget Office's 2024 economic outlook, GDP growth is projected at 2.1% for 2025
findings.issue: Incorrect - CBO projects 1.9% for 2025, not 2.1%. Source: cbo.gov/publication/60870

findings.quote: The World Bank estimates global GDP growth at 2.9% for the same period
findings.issue: Incorrect - World Bank projects 2.7% for 2025, not 2.9%. Source: worldbank.org/en/news/press-release/2025/01/16/gep-january-2025-press-release

findings.quote: Bitcoin traded at $42,300 as of the same date
findings.issue: Grossly incorrect - Bitcoin was above $90,000 in December 2024. Source: statista.com/statistics/326707/bitcoin-price-index/

findings.quote: The S&P 500 closed at 4,750 points on December 15, 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect - S&P 500 was around 5,800-6,000 in mid-December 2024. Source: finance.yahoo.com/quote/%5EGSPC/history/
Specific future date (Dec 15, 2024) cited as historical fact

findings.quote: Oil prices (WTI crude) averaged $78 per barrel in November 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect - WTI averaged $69.95 in November 2024. Source: statista.com/statistics/279941/west-texas-intermediate-wti-crude-oil-price/
